content.question: Which of the following best explains why there is no growth on plate II?

choices.label: The initial E. coli culture was not ampicillin-resistant.
The transformation procedure killed the bacteria.
Nutrient agar inhibits E. coli growth.
The bacteria on the plate were transformed.

content.answer: The initial E. coli culture was not ampicillin-resistant.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
